name: Forest Knight
description:
This game was made in under 48-hours for the Miziziziz Game Jam. Play as a knight that is traveling through a dying forest to get the golden torch and save the forest.  Avoid enemies and other obstacles along the way that will try to stop you from getting to the golden torch.

How to Play:

    Arrow keys to move the knight

    Bump enemies and other things to attack

Art: 

    Kenny 1-bit-pack

Features:

    Menu (with credits)

    Destroy able title 

    Big level with lots of content

    End screen
